key.justlevelingfork.title: Just Leveling
yacl3.config.justlevelingfork:config.log: If true, when populating the items a extra check will be made, if a item have a incorrect format it will log the line and continue loading without crashing
yacl3.config.justlevelingfork:config.clo: If true, when trying to craft a non unlocked item, it will close the crafting the menu
yacl3.config.justlevelingfork:config.dro: If true, locked items will be automatically dropped from player hands
yacl3.config.justlevelingfork:config.log: TAC:Zero have a special id system, so if you wanna get the id to restrict you need to enable this and shoot.
Iron's Spell 'n Spellbooks have a unique spell id for each spell, so if you wanna get the id to restrict you need to enable this and cast the spell.
yacl3.config.justlevelingfork:config.pla: Global max level, the global level is calculated summing all aptitudes level, so if this is set to 32 players will be able to only maximize 1 skill.
config.cloth-config.justlevelingfork.loc:
How to add a lock item:
<Mod name>§b:§f<Item name>§b#§f<Aptitude>§b:§f<Level>

If you want add more aptitudes just write: (you can add as many as you want)
<Mod name>§b:§f<Item name>§b#§f<Aptitude>§b:§f<Level>§b;§f<Aptitude>§b:§f<Level>§b...§f

If you want make the item droppable just add to the final §b<droppable>§f like this example:
minecraft§b:§ftotem_of_undying§b#§fconstitution§b:§f16§b;§fmagic:12§b<droppable>
config.cloth-config.justlevelingfork.tre:
How to add a treasure item:
<Mod name>§b:§f<Item name>

If you wanna add a nbt use §b{ }§f like this example:
<Mod name>§b:§f<Item name>§b{§fNBT§b}§f

Finally we have list, the list is if you got a treasure chance you will get 1 item from the list, to adding a list write:
<Name list>§bList[§f Here you can put as many items as you want, to separate them use §b;§f to close the list just use §b]§f
config.cloth-config.justlevelingfork.con:
How to add a convergence item: (to make it fair the convergence only will give you 1 result)
<Mod name>§b:§f<Item name>§b#§f<Mod name result>§b:§f<Item name result>
screen.aptitude.title: Aptitudes
commands.argument.aptitude.not_found: Aptitude %s not found or doesn't exist!
commands.argument.title.not_found: Title %s not found or doesn't exist!
commands.message.aptitude.set: The player %s now has %s levels in %s
commands.message.title.set: The player %s now has the Title %s
commands.message.title.unset: The player %s now no longer has the Title %s
commands.message.capability.not_found: The player doesn't have a valid capability!
overlay.aptitude.message: You can't use this item yet! You need:
tooltip.aptitude.level_up: Spent %s levels (%s xp) to level up %s.
tooltip.aptitude.global_max_level: Global max aptitude level of %s reached.
tooltip.passive.title: Passive -
tooltip.skill.title: Skill -
tooltip.passive.description.passive_requ: You need %s %s to level up to %s.
tooltip.passive.description.max_level: You can achieve %s in the max level.
tooltip.skill.scholar.lock_item: You need more intelligence to read this
passive.justlevelingfork.attack_damage.d: Physical damage you can deal when you attack.
passive.justlevelingfork.attack_knockbac: Knockback applied when you deals damage with physical attacks.
passive.justlevelingfork.knockback_resis: Resistance to knockback caused by enemies.
passive.justlevelingfork.max_health.desc: Maximum health you have, 1 point means half heart.
passive.justlevelingfork.projectile_dama: Arrow damage you can deal when you shoot.
passive.justlevelingfork.armor.descripti: Nullifies a lesser portion of damage from attacks that deal greater damage.
passive.justlevelingfork.armor_toughness: Mitigate the power of strong attacks.
passive.justlevelingfork.attack_speed.de: Controls the length of the cooldown time for the hand.
passive.justlevelingfork.entity_reach.de: Distance between the player and the other entity for the attack.
passive.justlevelingfork.block_reach.des: Distance between the player and the block.
passive.justlevelingfork.break_speed.des: Speed to break a block with tools. (only affects the pickaxe, axe and shovel)
passive.justlevelingfork.beneficial_effe: Time of potions that benefit the player.
passive.justlevelingfork.magic_resist.de: Nullifies a lesser portion of magic damage caused by: Harming potions, Evoker fangs, Wither skulls, Thorns enchantments, Guardian beams, etc.
passive.justlevelingfork.luck.descriptio: Increases the probability of finding high-quality loot from fishing or naturally-generated chests.
passive.justlevelingfork.critical_damage: An attack that deals extra damage compared to a regular attack. (applies when the player run or fall in a jump)
skill.justlevelingfork.one_handed.descri: Weapon damage will increase by %s if you only use one hand.
skill.justlevelingfork.fighting_spirit.d: When you kill an enemy you will gain Strength %s for %s.
skill.justlevelingfork.berserker.descrip: If you have less than or equal to %s of your maximum health, all your attacks will become critical damage.
skill.justlevelingfork.athletics.descrip: Your breathing will increase by %s, now you will be able to breathe underwater longer.
skill.justlevelingfork.turtle_shield.des: Shulker projectiles will no longer affect you with the levitation effect.
skill.justlevelingfork.lion_heart.descri: Reduces the time of all negative effects by %s. This will only apply to effects applied to you by enemies.
Damaging an enemy with an arrow will cause you to gain Speed %s for %s.
skill.justlevelingfork.stealth_mastery.d: Now you can hide from your enemies, the vision is reduced by %s, crouching will reduce it further to %s. Shooting arrows while crouching will increase their damage by %s.
skill.justlevelingfork.cat_eyes.descript: Now you have permanent Night Vision, the darkness is nothing to you anymore.
skill.justlevelingfork.snow_walker.descr: Walk over Powder Snow without falling.
skill.justlevelingfork.counter_attack.de: When an enemy damages you, for %s your next attack will increase by %s of the enemy's damage taken.
skill.justlevelingfork.diamond_skin.desc: Now you have permanent Resistance %s, crouching will give you %s extra armor.
skill.justlevelingfork.scholar.descripti: You can now read the enchantments of the ancient inhabitants of this world. You wonder how these enchantments were created...
skill.justlevelingfork.haggler.descripti: Haggling is an art that you now possess, the villagers will give you a %s discount on all their trades.
skill.justlevelingfork.alchemy_manipulat: The power of alchemy is now in your hands, all the potions you drink will amplifier their power by %s.
Even the hardest block now does not compare to your mining ability, now you will be %s times faster when crushing obsidian.
skill.justlevelingfork.treasure_hunter.d: Find buried treasure, the probability is %s when dig in any type of dirt.
skill.justlevelingfork.convergence.descr: Crafting some items will return part of the materials spent, the probability is %s
skill.justlevelingfork.safe_port.descrip: Teleporting with a Ender Pearl will no longer hurt you.
skill.justlevelingfork.life_eater.descri: Killing an entity causes you to absorb part of its health, you will gain %s half heart.
You can access to ender chest from inventory.
skill.justlevelingfork.critical_roll.des: When you make a critical attack you will roll a dice, rolling a 6 will increase your critical damage by %s, rolling a 1 will decrease your critical damage by %s.
skill.justlevelingfork.lucky_drop.descri: You have a %s chance of getting %s mob drops every time you kill a mob.
skill.justlevelingfork.limit_breaker.des: You have a %s chance to deals %s when you attack a entity.
title.justlevelingfork.titleless.descrip: Nothing, titleless will not show a Title to others.
title.justlevelingfork.survivor.descript: Survive 100 days in minecraft alive. (sleeping doesn't count)
